camel.source.endpoint.blobOffset.name: camel.source.endpoint.blobOffset
camel.source.endpoint.blobOffset.description: Set the blob offset for the upload or download operations, default is 0

camel.source.endpoint.blobType.name: camel.source.endpoint.blobType
camel.source.endpoint.blobType.description: Set a blob type, 'blockblob' is default One of: [blockblob] [appendblob] [pageblob]

camel.source.endpoint.closeStreamAfterRe.name: camel.source.endpoint.closeStreamAfterRead
camel.source.endpoint.closeStreamAfterRe.description: Close the stream after read or keep it open, default is true

camel.source.endpoint.credentials.name: camel.source.endpoint.credentials
camel.source.endpoint.credentials.description: Set the storage credentials, required in most cases

camel.source.endpoint.dataLength.name: camel.source.endpoint.dataLength
camel.source.endpoint.dataLength.description: Set the data length for the download or page blob upload operations

camel.source.endpoint.fileDir.name: camel.source.endpoint.fileDir
camel.source.endpoint.fileDir.description: Set the file directory where the downloaded blobs will be saved to

camel.source.endpoint.publicForRead.name: camel.source.endpoint.publicForRead
camel.source.endpoint.publicForRead.description: Storage resources can be public for reading their content, if this property is enabled then the credentials do not have to be set

camel.source.endpoint.streamReadSize.name: camel.source.endpoint.streamReadSize
camel.source.endpoint.streamReadSize.description: Set the minimum read size in bytes when reading the blob content

camel.source.endpoint.validateClientURI.name: camel.source.endpoint.validateClientURI
camel.source.endpoint.validateClientURI.description: Whether to validate the Azure client URI

camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler.name: camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.name: camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler
camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.description: To let the consumer use a custom ExceptionHandler. Notice if the option bridgeErrorHandler is enabled then this option is not in use. By default the consumer will deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.name: camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern
camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.description: Sets the exchange pattern when the consumer creates an exchange. One of: [InOnly] [InOut] [InOptionalOut]

camel.source.endpoint.basicPropertyBindi.name: camel.source.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding
camel.source.endpoint.basicPropertyBindi.description: Whether the endpoint should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.source.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.source.endpoint.synchronous
camel.source.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.source.endpoint.credentialsAccount.name: camel.source.endpoint.credentialsAccountKey
camel.source.endpoint.credentialsAccount.description: Set the storage account key used during authentication phase

camel.source.endpoint.credentialsAccount.name: camel.source.endpoint.credentialsAccountName
camel.source.endpoint.credentialsAccount.description: Set the storage account name used during authentication phase

camel.component.azure-blob.blobOffset.name: camel.component.azure-blob.blobOffset
camel.component.azure-blob.blobOffset.description: Set the blob offset for the upload or download operations, default is 0

camel.component.azure-blob.blobType.name: camel.component.azure-blob.blobType
camel.component.azure-blob.blobType.description: Set a blob type, 'blockblob' is default One of: [blockblob] [appendblob] [pageblob]

camel.component.azure-blob.closeStreamAf.name: camel.component.azure-blob.closeStreamAfterRead
camel.component.azure-blob.closeStreamAf.description: Close the stream after read or keep it open, default is true

camel.component.azure-blob.credentials.name: camel.component.azure-blob.credentials
camel.component.azure-blob.credentials.description: Set the storage credentials, required in most cases

camel.component.azure-blob.dataLength.name: camel.component.azure-blob.dataLength
camel.component.azure-blob.dataLength.description: Set the data length for the download or page blob upload operations

camel.component.azure-blob.fileDir.name: camel.component.azure-blob.fileDir
camel.component.azure-blob.fileDir.description: Set the file directory where the downloaded blobs will be saved to

camel.component.azure-blob.publicForRead.name: camel.component.azure-blob.publicForRead
camel.component.azure-blob.publicForRead.description: Storage resources can be public for reading their content, if this property is enabled then the credentials do not have to be set

camel.component.azure-blob.streamReadSiz.name: camel.component.azure-blob.streamReadSize
camel.component.azure-blob.streamReadSiz.description: Set the minimum read size in bytes when reading the blob content

camel.component.azure-blob.validateClien.name: camel.component.azure-blob.validateClientURI
camel.component.azure-blob.validateClien.description: Whether to validate the Azure client URI

camel.component.azure-blob.bridgeErrorHa.name: camel.component.azure-blob.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.component.azure-blob.bridgeErrorHa.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.component.azure-blob.basicProperty.name: camel.component.azure-blob.basicPropertyBinding
camel.component.azure-blob.basicProperty.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.component.azure-blob.credentialsAc.name: camel.component.azure-blob.credentialsAccountKey
camel.component.azure-blob.credentialsAc.description: Set the storage account key used during authentication phase

camel.component.azure-blob.credentialsAc.name: camel.component.azure-blob.credentialsAccountName
camel.component.azure-blob.credentialsAc.description: Set the storage account name used during authentication phase
